title: Bard chroma
body: Bard's classic chroma pack didnt show up in the skin selection screen

replies.body:
Hey Rhyvin - 

Thanks for the report! Are you noticing this every game, or was it only a one time occurrence?
Yes it does happen every game
Which queue are you in/is it all queues?
It was all queues, but it seems to be fixed now
I saw it a few times and never really thought about it before  I can play some more and double check
